Title: Requires that the distinctive license plate numbers issued to the owner of a registered motor vehicle be changed within a week after such plates being stolen
Summary: Requires that the distinctive license plate numbers issued to the owner of a registered motor vehicle be changed and the registration record for such motor vehicle be updated to reflect such change within a week after such plates being stolen.
LawCode: Amd ยง401, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring that the distinctive license plate numbers issued to an owner of a registered motor vehicle be updated within seven days of such plate or plates being stolen
